programme.title: Black Adam, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: Bestowed with the almighty powers of the gods, Black Adam's unique form of justice, born out of rage, is challenged by modern-day heroes who form the Justice Society: Hawkman, Dr. Fate, Atom Smasher and Cyclone.

programme.title: D...: The Musical, (2023, Musical)
programme.desc: Two self-obsessed businessmen discover they're long-lost identical twins and come together to plot the reunion of their divorced parents.

programme.title: St. Vincent, (2014, Comedy)
programme.desc: An unlikely bond forms between a single woman's 12-year-old son (Jaeden Lieberher) and the boozy misanthrope (Bill Murray) who lives next door.

programme.title: Gifted, (2017, Drama)
programme.desc: A man (Chris Evans) wages a legal battle against his mother (Lindsay Duncan) for custody of his orphaned niece (Mckenna Grace), a young mathematics prodigy who wants to live with him.

programme.title: Gifted, (2017, Drama)
programme.desc: A man (Chris Evans) wages a legal battle against his mother (Lindsay Duncan) for custody of his orphaned niece (Mckenna Grace), a young mathematics prodigy who wants to live with him.

programme.title: Birds of Prey (and the Fantabulous Emancipation of One Harley Quinn), (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Harley Quinn faces the wrath of narcissistic crime boss Black Mask and every other thug in Gotham. But things soon even out for Harley when she becomes unexpected allies with three deadly women -- Huntress, Black Canary and Renee Montoya.

programme.title: Love Lies Bleeding, (2024, Thriller)
programme.desc: A bodybuilder heading through town to Vegas is thrust into the dangerous plot of a violent crime family when she falls into a steamy romance with her trainer.

programme.title: The Farewell, (2019, Comedy)
programme.desc: Billi's family returns to China under the guise of a fake wedding to stealthily say goodbye to their beloved matriarch -- the only person that doesn't know she only has a few weeks to live.

programme.title: Sully, (2016, Drama)
programme.desc: After landing US Airways Flight 1549 in New York's Hudson River, Capt. Chesley "Sully" Sullenberger (Tom Hanks) faces an investigation that threatens to destroy his career and reputation.

programme.title: The Ballad of Lefty Brown, (2017, Western)
programme.desc: A merciless cowboy sets out on a dangerous journey across the frontier, determined to do whatever it takes to avenge his longtime partner's brutal murder.

programme.title: House of 1000 Corpses, (2003, Horror)
programme.desc: Four travelers take refuge in the home of a clan of demented killers. Written and directed by musician Rob Zombie.

programme.title: The 9th Life of Louis Drax, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: An acclaimed neurologist (Jamie Dornan) taps into the unconscious mind of a 9-year-old boy (Aiden Longworth) who has survived nine near-death accidents.

programme.title: Confidence, (2003, Crime Story)
programme.desc: A con man (Edward Burns) and his crew swindle a gangster's accountant, then try to repay him by stealing from a crooked banker.

programme.title: Eye in the Sky, (2015, Thriller)
programme.desc: A lieutenant general (Alan Rickman) and a colonel (Helen Mirren) face political opposition after ordering a drone missile strike to take out a group of suicide bombers in Nairobi, Kenya.

programme.title: Dream Scenario, (2023, Horror)
programme.desc: A family man finds his life turned upside down when millions of strangers suddenly start seeing him in their dreams. However, when his nighttime appearances take a nightmarish turn, he's forced to navigate the consequences of his newfound stardom.

programme.title: House Party, (2023, Comedy)
programme.desc: Aspiring club promoters and best buds Damon and Kevin need a huge windfall to make their problems go away. They decide to host the party of the year at an exclusive mansion, which just happens to belong to none other than NBA superstar LeBron James.

programme.title: The Exception, (2016, History)
programme.desc: During World War II, a soldier (Jai Courtney) travels to a secluded mansion to investigate a mysterious German monarch. He soon finds himself entangled in a web of deceit while having a dangerous love affair with a local Jewish woman (Lily James).

programme.title: Good Hair, (2009, Documentary)
programme.desc: Comic Chris Rock explores how hairstyles affect the self-esteem, activities and relationships of African-Americans.

programme.title: Mike and Dave Need Wedding Dates, (2016, Comedy)
programme.desc: Two hard-partying brothers (Zac Efron, Adam Devine) bring two wild and uncontrollable women to their sister's (Sugar Lyn Beard) wedding in Hawaii.

programme.title: Mike and Dave Need Wedding Dates, (2016, Comedy)
programme.desc: Two hard-partying brothers (Zac Efron, Adam Devine) bring two wild and uncontrollable women to their sister's (Sugar Lyn Beard) wedding in Hawaii.

programme.title: Margaret, (2011, Drama)
programme.desc: Feeling responsible for a fatal traffic accident, a high-school student lashes out when her attempts to make amends meet with opposition.

programme.title: Invictus, (2009, Drama)
programme.desc: Following the fall of apartheid, Nelson Mandela (Morgan Freeman) tries to unite his countrymen by supporting the South African rugby team's underdog bid for the 1995 World Cup Championship.

programme.title: Teen Spirit, (2018, Drama)
programme.desc: A shy teenager dreams of escaping her small town and pursuing her passion to sing. With the help of an unlikely mentor, she enters a local singing competition that will test her integrity, talent and ambition.

programme.title: Table 19, (2017, Comedy)
programme.desc: Dumped by the best man (Wyatt Russell), an ex-maid of honor (Anna Kendrick) must sit with a group of strangers (Craig Robinson, Lisa Kudrow) during her friend's wedding reception.

programme.title: The Sitter, (2011, Comedy)
programme.desc: The world's worst baby sitter (Jonah Hill) takes a brood of rambunctious children (Max Records, Landry Bender, Kevin Hernandez) on a wild night-time odyssey through New York.

programme.title: 3 From Hell, (2019, Horror)
programme.desc: Crazed killers Baby Firefly, Captain Spaulding and Otis Driftwood unleash bloody mayhem after escaping from prison.

programme.title: Scream, (1996, Horror)
programme.desc: A psycho killer targets a past victim's daughter (Neve Campbell), while a tabloid TV reporter (Courteney Cox) homes in on his identity.

programme.title: Scream 2, (1997, Horror)
programme.desc: A masked killer continues to pursue a California student (Neve Campbell) and her friends at an Ohio college.

programme.title: Scream 3, (2000, Horror)
programme.desc: Murders draw a young woman (Neve Campbell), a reporter (Courteney Cox Arquette) and an ex-policeman (David Arquette) to the set of a movie inspired by horrific events that they survived.

programme.title: The Exception, (2016, History)
programme.desc: During World War II, a soldier (Jai Courtney) travels to a secluded mansion to investigate a mysterious German monarch. He soon finds himself entangled in a web of deceit while having a dangerous love affair with a local Jewish woman (Lily James).

programme.title: The Souvenir, (2019, Romance)
programme.desc: A shy but ambitious film student falls into an intense, emotionally fraught relationship with a charismatic but untrustworthy older man.

programme.title: Role Models, (2008, Comedy)
programme.desc: Forced to join a mentorship program, two irresponsible men (Seann William Scott, Paul Rudd) must help a pair of impressionable boys navigate the troubled waters of youth.

programme.title: Almost Christmas, (2016, Christmas)
programme.desc: A beloved patriarch asks his family members for one gift this holiday season: to get along. If they can honor that wish and spend five days under the same roof without killing one another, it will be a Christmas miracle.

programme.title: Almost Christmas, (2016, Christmas)
programme.desc: A beloved patriarch asks his family members for one gift this holiday season: to get along. If they can honor that wish and spend five days under the same roof without killing one another, it will be a Christmas miracle.

programme.title: The Boss, (2016, Comedy)
programme.desc: After her release from prison, a former CEO (Melissa McCarthy) battles old enemies while trying to build a brownie empire with her ex-assistant (Kristen Bell).

programme.title: The Disaster Artist, (2017, Comedy)
programme.desc: The incredible true story of aspiring filmmaker and Hollywood outsider Tommy Wiseau as he and his best friend defiantly pursue their dreams and embark on the hilarious odyssey of making the now-infamous, cult classic "The Room.".

programme.title: St. Vincent, (2014, Comedy)
programme.desc: An unlikely bond forms between a single woman's 12-year-old son (Jaeden Lieberher) and the boozy misanthrope (Bill Murray) who lives next door.

programme.title: State of Play, (2009, Thriller)
programme.desc: An investigative journalist (Russell Crowe) stumbles into a cover-up of gigantic proportions as he and his partner probe the murder of a beloved congressman's (Ben Affleck) mistress.

programme.title: Big Miracle, (2012, Adventure)
programme.desc: A reporter (John Krasinski) in small-town Alaska and his former lover (Drew Barrymore), an environmentalist, try to form an international coalition to rescue three ice-trapped whales.

programme.title: It Comes at Night, (2017, Horror)
programme.desc: After a mysterious apocalypse leaves the world with few survivors, two families are forced to share a home in an uneasy alliance to keep the outside evil at bay -- only to learn that the true horror may come from within.

programme.title: The Legend of Tarzan, (2016, Adventure)
programme.desc: Lured from Victorian England to the wilds of the Congo, Tarzan (Alexander Skarsgrd) must return to the jungle to save his captive wife (Margot Robbie) from King Leopold's devious envoy (Christoph Waltz).

programme.title: Logan, (2017, Action)
programme.desc: In the near future, a weary Logan (Hugh Jackman) cares for an ailing Professor X (Patrick Stewart) while protecting a young mutant girl (Dafne Keen) from the dark forces that want to capture her.

programme.title: The Killing of a Sacred Deer, (2017, Thriller)
programme.desc: A fatherless teen starts to insinuate himself into the life of a renowned surgeon, his wife and two children. The full scope of his intent soon becomes menacingly clear when he confronts the doctor with a long-forgotten transgression.

programme.title: Skin, (2019, Documentary)
programme.desc: Nollywood actress Beverly Naya explores Black beauty and the practice of skin bleaching in African culture.

programme.title: The Souvenir, (2019, Romance)
programme.desc: A shy but ambitious film student falls into an intense, emotionally fraught relationship with a charismatic but untrustworthy older man.

programme.title: Sunset Boulevard, (1950, Drama)
programme.desc: Hack screenwriter Joe (William Holden) moves in with Hollywood has-been Norma (Gloria Swanson) and her chauffeur, Max (Erich von Stroheim).

programme.title: Anomalisa, (2015, Animated)
programme.desc: An inspirational speaker (David Thewlis) becomes reinvigorated after meeting a lively woman (Jennifer Jason Leigh) who shakes up his mundane existence.

programme.title: Summer Days, Summer Nights, (2018, Drama)
programme.desc: On the south shore of Long Island in the summer of 1983, a group of working-class teenagers and 20-somethings work their summer jobs, fall in and out of love, and wrestle with what the future holds when the summer ends and the real world beckons.

programme.title: The Passenger, (2023, Horror)
programme.desc: Randy is perfectly content to fade into the background, but when one of his co-workers goes on a sudden and violent rampage, he must face his fears and confront his troubled past to survive.

programme.title: Bull Durham, (1988, Romance)
programme.desc: A literary baseball groupie (Susan Sarandon) romances a pitcher (Tim Robbins) and a catcher (Kevin Costner) on a minor-league North Carolina team.

programme.title: Dog, (2022, Comedy)
programme.desc: With a dog named Lulu by his side, Army Ranger Briggs races down the Pacific Coast to make it to a soldier's funeral on time. Along the way, Briggs and Lulu drive each other completely crazy, break a handful of laws and narrowly evade death.

programme.title: Up in the Air, (2009, Comedy)
programme.desc: A corporate downsizing expert (George Clooney) realizes he is developing real feelings for a frequent bedmate (Vera Farmiga) whose cache of travel miles and club cards rivals his own.

programme.title: Overboard, (1987, Comedy)
programme.desc: A yachtsman's (Edward Herrmann) wife (Goldie Hawn) falls overboard, forgets who she is and becomes an Oregon carpenter's (Kurt Russell) mate.

programme.title: In & Out, (1997, Comedy)
programme.desc: An actor's (Matt Dillon) comment stirs media speculation about his prim Midwestern teacher's (Kevin Kline) sexuality.

programme.title: Waiting to Exhale, (1995, Romance)
programme.desc: Relationships preoccupy Phoenix friends: divorcee Bernadine (Angela Bassett), careerist Savannah (Whitney Houston), popular Robin (Lela Rochon), and Gloria, whose ex-husband is gay.

programme.title: Legally Blonde, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: A sorority queen (Reese Witherspoon) enrolls in Harvard to prove to her former boyfriend that she has more than good looks.

programme.title: Legally Blonde 2: Red, White & Blonde, (2003, Comedy)
programme.desc: Fired from her firm, a young Boston lawyer (Reese Witherspoon) heads to Washington, D.C., to fight for animal rights.

programme.title: Moonstruck, (1987, Romance)
programme.desc: An Italian-American widow (Cher), engaged to a reticent suitor, falls in love with his brother (Nicolas Cage).

programme.title: The Visitor, (2022, Horror)
programme.desc: When Robert and his wife move to her childhood home, he discovers an old portrait in the attic of a man who looks just like him. He soon travels down a frightening rabbit hole as he tries to discover the true identity of his mysterious doppelgnger.

programme.title: Gretel & Hansel, (2020, Horror)
programme.desc: When their mother descends into madness, siblings Gretel and Hansel must fend for themselves in the dark and unforgiving woods. Stumbling upon an isolated home, the children soon suspect that the generous but mysterious owner has sinister intentions.

programme.title: Annie Hall, (1977, Romance)
programme.desc: A New York comedian (Woody Allen) recalls his lost love, a kooky singer (Diane Keaton) with a style all her own.

programme.title: This is Christmas, (2022, Christmas)
programme.desc: Following Adam and Emma on their daily commute from the village of Langton to London, where they meet the same passengers every day.

programme.title: Snack Shack, (2024, Drama)
programme.desc: Best friends AJ and Moose seize the opportunity to run the local pool's rundown snack shack. However, things take an unexpected turn when they meet Brooke, an effortlessly cool lifeguard who puts their big summer plans -- and friendship -- at risk.

programme.title: Escape From Alcatraz, (1979, Thriller)
programme.desc: Based on the true story of a hardened convict who engineered an elaborate plan to bust out of the famed prison in 1962.

programme.title: Flags of Our Fathers, (2006, War)
programme.desc: Some of the servicemen who raised the U.S. flag on Mount Suribachi during the Battle of Iwo Jima at the end of World War II live to hear of their status as heroes.

programme.title: Into the Wild, (2007, Drama)
programme.desc: A top student and athlete leaves his middle-class life to venture into Alaska, only to meet people who will eventually shape his values and life.

programme.title: Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home, (1986, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Spock (Leonard Nimoy), Kirk (William Shatner) and the Enterprise time-travel to modern-day San Francisco to bring humpback whales to the 23rd century.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven, (2016, Western)
programme.desc: Desperate townspeople hire seven mercenaries (Denzel Washington, Chris Pratt, Ethan Hawke) to battle a greedy industrialist (Peter Sarsgaard) and his ruthless henchmen in the Old West.

programme.title: True Grit, (2010, Western)
programme.desc: A teenage girl (Hailee Steinfeld) enlists the aid of a boozy, trigger-happy lawman (Jeff Bridges) to hunt down her father's killer (Josh Brolin).

programme.title: Death Wish, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Dr. Paul Kersey is an experienced trauma surgeon, a man who has spent his life saving lives. After an attack on his family, Paul embarks on his own mission for justice.

programme.title: Rob Roy, (1995, Drama)
programme.desc: The Scottish folk hero (Liam Neeson) fights for clan and honor, hunted by vile aristocrats in the 1700s.

programme.title: True Grit, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: One-eyed Marshal "Rooster" Cogburn (John Wayne) and a Texas Ranger (Glen Campbell) help a girl (Kim Darby) find her father's killer.

programme.title: The Krays, (1990, Crime Story)
programme.desc: Warped by their mother (Billie Whitelaw), cockney twins Ronald and Reginald Kray (Gary Kemp, Martin Kemp) become gangsters in 1950s London.

programme.title: At Close Range, (1986, Crime Story)
programme.desc: A rural teen (Sean Penn) joins his father's (Christopher Walken) crime clan and winds up running for his life with his girlfriend (Mary Stuart Masterson).

programme.title: Thief, (1981, Action)
programme.desc: A safecracker (James Caan) runs into trouble with the mob when he wants to quit after one last heist.

programme.title: Good Will Hunting, (1997, Drama)
programme.desc: A therapist (Robin Williams), a mathematician and working-class roughs vie for the soul of a janitor (Matt Damon) with a genius IQ.

programme.title: Atlantic City, (1980, Drama)
programme.desc: A boardwalk numbers runner (Burt Lancaster) feels young again with a casino clam shucker (Susan Sarandon) and a lucky cocaine deal.

programme.title: Bulletproof Monk, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: A martial-arts master (Chow Yun-Fat) finds an unlikely protg (Seann William Scott) to take over the responsibility of protecting an ancient scroll.

programme.title: The Golden Child, (1986, Comedy)
programme.desc: A professional child-finder (Eddie Murphy) is recruited to rescue a mystical Tibetan boy from a shape-shifting villain (Charles Dance).

programme.title: Hot Tub Time Machine, (2010, Comedy)
programme.desc: Following a night of drinking in a ski-resort hot tub, four pals awake in 1986, getting a chance to rewrite the past.

programme.title: Barbershop, (2002, Comedy)
programme.desc: The owner of a popular barbershop considers selling the place to a loan shark who wants to convert it into a strip club.

programme.title: Barbershop 2: Back in Business, (2004, Comedy)
programme.desc: The owner (Ice Cube) of a barbershop faces pressure from a corporation that is opening establishments in his neighborhood.

programme.title: The Golden Child, (1986, Comedy)
programme.desc: A professional child-finder (Eddie Murphy) is recruited to rescue a mystical Tibetan boy from a shape-shifting villain (Charles Dance).

programme.title: WarGames, (1983, Thriller)
programme.desc: A teen taps his computer into the NORAD missile-defense system and plays a video game, "Global Thermonuclear War.".

programme.title: Everything You Always Wanted to Know About Sex (But Were Afraid to Ask), (1972, Comedy)
programme.desc: Questions from Dr. David Reuben's sex manual are answered in seven comic sketches, concerning subjects from aphrodisiacs to male anatomy.

programme.title: A Midsummer Night's Sex Comedy, (1982, Comedy)
programme.desc: An inventor (Woody Allen), his wife (Mary Steenburgen) and two other couples spend an enchanted circa-1900 country weekend.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Four unlikely terrapin warriors rise from the sewers and join forces with fearless reporter April O'Neil (Megan Fox) to save New York from Shredder and his evil minions.

programme.title: Transformers, (2007, Action)
programme.desc: An ancient struggle between two Cybertronian races, the heroic Autobots and the evil Decepticons, comes to Earth, with a clue to the ultimate power held by a teenager.

programme.title: Interstellar, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: As mankind's time on Earth comes to an end, a group of explorers (Matthew McConaughey, Anne Hathaway) begins the most important mission in human history: traveling beyond the galaxy to discover if there is a future for man among the stars.

programme.title: Apollo 13, (1995, History)
programme.desc: Astronauts Jim Lovell, Fred Haise and Jack Swigert try to return to Earth after an explosion aborts the April 1970 moonshot.

programme.title: Virtuosity, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: An ex-cop doing prison time chases a virtual-reality killer from the program onto the Los Angeles streets.

programme.title: The Matrix, (1999, Science fiction)
programme.desc: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.

programme.title: Star Trek, (2009, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Young James T. Kirk (Chris Pine), Spock (Zachary Quinto) and the rest of the Enterprise crew embark on a collision course with a vengeful Romulan.

programme.title: Star Trek Into Darkness, (2013, Science fiction)

programme.title: Naruto e sua equipe chegam ao Pas das Ondas, onde o perverso negociante chamado Gato controla a terra. Gato contrata Zabuza Momochi para matar Tazuna. Animado, Naruto no v a hora de enfrentar esse poderoso ninja assassino.
programme.desc: Naruto: O Assassino Da Nvoa

programme.title: Kakashi est em vantagem na batalha contra Zabuza, mas a situao se reverte quando Kakashi preso na Priso de gua de Zabuza! Kakashi insisite para que a equipe fuja, mas Naruto lembra da promessa que fez de nunca mais fugir e decide ficar!!
programme.desc: Naruto: O Juramento De Dor

programme.title: Graas ao plano de Naruto, Kakashi escapa da Priso de gua. Zabuza derrotado e ferido, mas de repente um misterioso ninja rastreador aparece e mata Zabuza. Naruto se espanta ao ver um garoto no muito mais velho que ele derrotar Zabuza to facilmente.
programme.desc: Naruto: Kakashi, O Guerreiro Sharingan

programme.title: Recuperando-se na casa de Tazuna, Kakashi conclui que Zabuza no morreu e que o jovem ninja o ajudou a escapar! Kakashi decide comear um novo treinamento para ajudar Naruto, Sasuke e Sakura a controlarem melhor seus chakras!
programme.desc: Naruto: A Floresta do Chakra

programme.title: Na aldeia com Tazuna, Sakura v o sofrimento do povo no Pas das Ondas governado por Gato. Tazuna constri uma ponte que dar acesso a outras terras para as pessoas no dependerem mais de Gato. Naruto e Sasuke treinam, usando chakra para subir em rvore.
programme.desc: Naruto: A Terra Onde Uma Vez o Heri Viveu
programme.sub-title: A Terra Onde Uma Vez o Heri Viveu

programme.title: Enquanto Naruto treina para controlar seu chacra, algum misterioso aparece de repente e diz que, para se tornar forte, preciso ter determinao para proteger o que ama. A figura misteriosa ecoa o sentimento de Naruto, e os dois sentem uma conexo.
programme.desc: Naruto: Batalha Na Ponte: Zabuza Retorna

programme.title: hora de lutar contra Zabuza outra vez, e agora ele est acompanhado do ninja rastreador. Os dois reparam as habilidades de Sasuke, e ele percebe o imenso poder do ninja mascarado. Sasuke e o ninja se preparam para lutar, como se o destino os chamasse.
programme.desc: Naruto: O Jutsu Secreto De Haku: Espelhos De Cristal De Gelo
programme.sub-title: O Jutsu Secreto De Haku: Espelhos De Cristal De Gelo

programme.title: Sasuke est em apuros dentro dos Espelhos Cristal de Gelo de Haku, e Naruto chega para salv-lo. Sasuke tem um plano para combater o jutsu de Haku, mas falha por causa das aes inesperadas de Naruto. Por fim, os dois jovens ninjas so presos.
programme.desc: Naruto: O Ninja Nmero Um Hiper Ativo E Cabea Oca Entram Na Briga
programme.sub-title: O Ninja Nmero Um Hiper Ativo E Cabea Oca Entram Na Briga

programme.title: Vendo que no h tempo a perder, Kakashi decide usar o Sharingan mais uma vez para derrotar Zabuza. Mas Zabuza um ninja experiente em batalhas mortais e, na primeira vez em que enfrentou o Sharingan, Zabuza conseguiu bolar uma estratgia.
programme.desc: Naruto: Visibilidade Zero: O Sharingan Desvendado

programme.title: Naruto e Sasuke so atacados dentro dos Espelhos Cristal de Gelo de Haku. Durante a batalha, Sasuke percebe o poder do seu prprio Sharingan e comea a desviar dos ataques de Haku. Haku decide acabar com ele. Sasuke usa seu corpo para proteger Naruto...
programme.desc: Naruto: O Selo Quebrado

programme.title: Naruto finalmente explode! Sua raiva por Haku libera o poder da Raposa de Nove Caudas. O chakra de Naruto est to intenso que at Kakashi e Zabuza, que esto lutando distncia, percebem. Haku incapaz de fazer algo diante do poder secreto de Naruto.
programme.desc: Naruto: Passado Branco, Ambio Escondida

programme.title: Haku pede a Naruto que acabe com ele. Naruto questiona a filosofia de Haku sobre existir apenas para lutar e ganhar. Enquanto isso, a batalha entre Kakashi e Zabuza chega ao clmax. Com a vitria ao alcance, Kakashi libera sua manobra mais devastadora.
programme.desc: Naruto: As Armas Conhecidas Como Shinobi

programme.title: Pensando em Haku, Naruto confronta Zabuza com raiva. Sem demonstrar emoes, Zabuza se sente arrasado pela perda de Haku, a nica pessoa em quem confiava no mundo. Naruto aprende que esse tipo de realidade cruel , de fato, o destino de um ninja.
programme.desc: Naruto: O Demnio Na Neve

programme.title: Naruto e sua equipe voltam Aldeia Oculta da Folha depois da batalha do Pas das Ondas. Mesmo concluindo novas misses, Naruto est insatisfeito com a rotina diria, mas logo ele descobre que estrangeiros esto se juntando na Aldeia da Folha.
programme.desc: Naruto: A Prova Chunin

programme.title: Naruto, Sasuke e Sakura so escolhidos para fazer a Prova Chunin. Iruka se ope participao dos trs, pois os considera muito novos e inexperientes para o desafio. Kakashi, porm, acredita que eles cresceram e esto mais prontos do que nunca.
programme.desc: Naruto: Identifique-Se : Novos E Poderosos Rivais

programme.title: Enquanto Naruto, Sasuke e Sakura se preparam para a prova, um ninja chamado Rock Lee aparece. Lee quer lutar contra Sasuke, que possui o poder do cl Uchiha. Sasuke aceita o desafio de Lee, mas fica s na defesa devido aos ataques rpidos desse oponente.
programme.desc: Naruto: O Desafio Chunin:Rock Lee Contra Sasuke
programme.sub-title: O Desafio Chunin:Rock Lee Contra Sasuke

programme.title: Naruto, Sasuke e Sakura se inscrevem oficialmente para a Prova Chunin e formam um time. Para passar, nenhum membro pode falhar.
programme.desc: Naruto: A Batalha Genin, Os Nove Novatos Se Enfrentam
programme.sub-title: A Batalha Genin, Os Nove Novatos Se Enfrentam

programme.title: Naruto e sua equipe iniciam a primeira prova. O examinador Ibiki Morino, um jonin (ninja de alto nvel) notrio e perito em interrograo. Sasuke e Sakura esto preocupados, pois se Naruto responder tudo errado, eles tambm falharo.
programme.desc: Naruto: Liguem Os Motores A Prova Chunin Comea
programme.sub-title: Liguem Os Motores A Prova Chunin Comea

programme.title: A parte mais difcil da prova comea na pergunta 10. Antes dos ninjas escutarem a pergunta, Ibiki coloca uma regra injusta para o problema: quem responder errado ser reprovado e no ter o direito de fazer qualquer Prova Chunin no futuro.
programme.desc: Naruto: A Dcima Pergunta Ou Tudo Ou Nada
programme.sub-title: A Dcima Pergunta Ou Tudo Ou Nada

programme.title: Konohamaru, neto do Terceiro Hokage da Aldeia da Folha, aparece durante a Prova Chunin com Moegi e Udon e cobre eventos para o jornal da Academia Ninja. Ele v Naruto como um irmo mais velho e, entrevistando os personagens, reconta suas aventuras.
programme.desc: Naruto: A Floresta Da Morte

programme.title: Na floresta da morte comea a segunda parte da Prova Chunin. Cada time recebe um tipo de pergaminho e deve roubar o outro tipo de outro time, chegando ao ponto final na torre com os dois pergaminhos.
programme.desc: Naruto: A Prova Chunin Segunda Etapa A Floresta Da Morte
programme.sub-title: A Prova Chunin Segunda Etapa A Floresta Da Morte

programme.title: A segunda parte da prova comea na floresta da morte. Sasuke nota que um inimigo se disfarou de Naruto. Sasuke salva e desamarra Naruto, e os trs membros criam uma senha para quando ficarem separados outra vez.
programme.desc: Naruto: Comer Ou Ser Comido - Pnico Na Floresta
programme.sub-title: Comer Ou Ser Comido - Pnico Na Floresta

programme.sub-title: O Contra-Ataque De Naruto, Nunca Se Renda!

programme.title: Ao ver Naruto lutar contra o ninja da Grama, Sasuke percebe que estava errado em fugir. Sasuke usa todo o potencial do seu Sharingan para afastar o ninja. Ele se apresenta como Orochimaru, some e deixa uma Marca da Maldio em Sasuke, que cai em dor.
programme.desc: Naruto: O Sharingan Revivido: Jutsu Chama Do Drago
programme.sub-title: O Sharingan Revivido: Jutsu Chama Do Drago

programme.desc: Naruto: A Promessa Do "Sobrancelhudo": Amor Eterno E Proteo
programme.sub-title: A Promessa Do "Sobrancelhudo": Amor Eterno E Proteo

programme.title: Protegendo Sakura, que no consegue mais se mover, Lee luta contra os trs ninja do Som. Ele usa sua habilidade secreta, mas ineficaz. Dosu o ataca, e Lee cai. Para proteger as pessoas que so importantes para ela, Sakura se levanta...
programme.desc: Naruto: Sakura Floresce

programme.desc: Naruto: Formao De Batalha: Ino-Shika-Cho

programme.title: Os ninjas do Som partem depois de enfrentar o poder de Sasuke. O time de Naruto tem um momento para se recuperar. Kiba consegue o segundo pergaminho e seu time vai em direo torre. O parceiro canino de Kiba, Akamaru, nota algo adiante e para.
programme.desc: Naruto: Akamaru Treme: A Fora Cruel De Gaara
programme.sub-title: Akamaru Treme: A Fora Cruel De Gaara

programme.desc: Naruto: O Segredo Do Pergaminho, No Permitido Olhar
programme.sub-title: O Segredo Do Pergaminho, No Permitido Olhar

programme.sub-title: Clone Contra Clone: Os Meus So Melhores Que Os Seus

programme.sub-title: Sobrevivendo Ao Corte: Os Nove Novatos Juntos Outra Vez

programme.sub-title: Estreitando O Campo, Morte Sbita, Eliminao!

programme.sub-title: Exploso Kunoichi: As Rivais Se Enfrentam

programme.sub-title: Akamaru Se Revela, Quem O Melhor Cachorro?

programme.title: Para derrotar RX, a Chefe da Tribo Demonaca, av de Maribaron, a Feiticeira Kaima Medusa dos 100 Olhos, desperta depois de um longo sono de 100 anos. A vida de Kyoko e de seus amigos est prestes a ser tomada pelo poder dos olhos da Medusa.
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX

programme.title: O Imperador de Crisis d um ultimato aos Quatro Comandantes. O Relgio Final do Imperador surge no Forte Crisis.
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX

programme.title: Aps vencer Gatridon, resultando na morte de Gadorian, desta vez quem decide se opor a RX Gatezon. Em meio a isso, Dasmader analisa friamente os movimentos de RX, parecendo ter encontrado uma nova maneira de dar fim ao King Stone de RX.
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX

programme.title: O Imprio Crisis declara guerra total a todos que se oporem a eles. Bosgan encarregado de destruir RX e tem a ajuda do "Guerreiro da Destruio", fornecido pelo Imperador Crisis: o Super Guerreiro Kaima Grandailas.
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX
programme.sub-title: Kamen Riders: Todos Juntos na Luta!

programme.title: RX desafia o Super Guerreiro Kaima Grandailas, arriscando sua vida nisso. No entanto, sua coragem desaparece junto das chamas da exploso dentro de Grandailas.
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX

programme.title: General Jark toma as rdeas da situao e vai diretamente ao encontro de RX. Antes disso, o Imperador Crisis mostra sua ira perante Jark e, alm de tortur-lo um pouco, decide aumentar seus poderes em quase 10 vezes...
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX

programme.title: O Imperador Crisis coleciona mais uma derrota ao ver que o Coronel Jark (Jark Middler) derrotado por RX. Dasmader solicita a Maribaron que convide RX at a base deles, que fica no Vale do Diabo, para uma reunio.
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX

programme.title: Toha confrontado pelo poderoso Baro Owl, do Imprio dos Ninjas. Ele aprende a histria da inscrio e descobre que sua misso mais difcil do que pensava.

programme.title: Manabu se revolta quando aprende na escola que vrios animais j foram extintos por causa dos humanos. Logo depois Juunin Makunba, um ninja criminoso e caador de animais em extino, atenta contra a vida de Tetsuzan.
programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja
programme.sub-title: 7 - O Caador da Selva Jnin Makunba Tha(Jiraiya) e Manabu

programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja

programme.title: Rei Yagyu sequestrada pela Famlia dos Feiticeiro e o resgate exigido a inscrio que revela Pako. Ryu pede ajuda a Toha e os dois traam um plano para resgat-la.
programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja

programme.title: Uma menina oferece uma estranha droga a Manabu e acaba deixando-o internado no hospital. Rei, Ryu e Toha investigam quem est por trs da venda desta droga e chegam a Kanin Dragon, um especialista em kung-fu.

programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: RedBad - A Invaso dos Francos, (1970, Action)
programme.desc: No incio da Idade Mdia, o rei frsio Redbad luta contra os francos que querem conquistar o imprio frsio livre. Para isso, ele tenta ganhar a confiana dos vikings, e tenta impedir a influncia crist sobre o norte europeu.

programme.title: A Gangue Zip Zap, (1970, Action)
programme.desc: Os irmos gmeos Zip e Zap so enviados para uma escola muito rgida. O diretor um homem muito bravo e que repudia qualquer forma de lazer. Cansados dessa situao, Zip e Zap formam um grupo para poder fazer suas travessuras e desafiar o diretor.

programme.title: O Rei da Montanha, (1970, Action)
programme.desc: Espen Ash Lad, filho de um pobre agricultor, embarca em uma misso perigosa com seus irmos para salvar a princesa de um vilo conhecido como o Rei da Montanha. O objetivo ganhar uma recompensa e salvar a fazenda da sua famlia da runa.

programme.title: Loucas por Amor, Viciadas em Dinheiro, (1970, Action)
programme.desc: Depois que seu marido perde o emprego, a dona de casa Bridget forada a assumir um trabalho como auxiliar de limpeza na Casa da Moeda em Kansas City, Missouri, e acaba planejando o roubo de uma fortuna em notas gastas destinadas destruio.

programme.title: Todos os Caminhos Levam a Roma, (1970, Action)
programme.desc: Maggie embarca em uma viagem para Itlia, com Summer, sua filha adolescente. Mas ao chegar l, Summer foge roubando o carro da me. Maggie contar com a ajuda de um ex-namorado para encontrar a filha.

programme.title: Trumbo - Lista Negra, (1970, Action)
programme.desc: Autor de algumas das histrias de maior sucesso da poca, Dalton Trumbo foi preso e proibido de trabalhar. Mesmo quando saiu da priso, demorou anos para vencer o boicote do governo, sofrendo com problemas envolvendo familiares e amigos prximos.

programme.title: Uma Beleza Fantstica, (1970, Action)
programme.desc: Um conto de fadas contemporneo sobre o surgimento de uma amizade improvvel entre uma jovem solitria que sonha ser autora de livros infantis e um vivo rabugento.

programme.title: Cordeiros e Carrascos, (1970, Action)
programme.desc: Um advogado resolve trabalhar no caso de um guarda de priso da frica do Sul que se traumatizou pelas execues em que participou.

programme.title: Escola de Espies, (1970, Action)
programme.desc: Aos 16 anos de idade, a agente especial Megan Walsh finge a prpria morte para recomear a vida como aluna de uma pequena escola.

programme.title: Teia de Corrupo, (1970, Action)
programme.desc: O lutador Liam sai da priso com o nico desejo de reatar o lao com seu filho. Mas, quando seu irmo se envolve com criminosos de alto escalo, ele no v alternativa a no ser se arriscar novamente.

programme.title: A Bela e a Fera, (1970, Entertainment)

programme.title: Amor Rebelde, (1970, Entertainment)

programme.title: Apex, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Cinco caadores pagam para caar um homem em uma ilha deserta, e acabam se tornando a presa.

programme.title: Epa! Cad o No?, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Dave e seu filho Finny se disfaram e conseguem entrar na Arca de No. Porm Finny e sua amiga, Leah, acidentalmente caem na gua. Agora, os dois precisam sobreviver a predadores e a inundao e tentar chegar ao topo de uma montanha.

programme.title: O Jovem Viking, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Halvdan no o tipo perfeito de viking, pois manca e considerado pelas outras crianas um estranho solitrio e sem amigos. Um dia, durante suas excurses solitrias ao rio, ele encontra Meia, a filha corajosa do rei.

programme.title: O Quatrilho, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Em 1910, em uma comunidade rural de imigrantes italianos no Rio Grande do Sul, dois casais dividem a mesma casa. O tempo faz com que uma das esposas se interesse pelo marido da outra. Ambos decidem fugir e recomear uma vida nova em outro lugar.

programme.title: Loucas por Amor, Viciadas em Dinheiro, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Depois que seu marido perde o emprego, a dona de casa Bridget forada a assumir um trabalho como auxiliar de limpeza na Casa da Moeda em Kansas City, Missouri, e acaba planejando o roubo de uma fortuna em notas gastas destinadas destruio.

programme.title: Colossal, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Gloria descobre que est conectada uma criatura gigantesca que est destruindo Seul e deve descobrir por que a sua existncia aparentemente insignificante tem um impacto to colossal sobre o destino da Terra.

programme.title: Todos os Caminhos Levam a Roma, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Maggie embarca em uma viagem para Itlia, com Summer, sua filha adolescente. Mas ao chegar l, Summer foge roubando o carro da me. Maggie contar com a ajuda de um ex-namorado para encontrar a filha.

programme.title: Jungle - Protegendo a Selva, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Dipankar Nair gerencia santurio de elefantes ameaado por caadores de marfim. Seu filho Raj, veterinrio de Mumbai, visita o local no aniversrio da morte da me e se aproxima dos elefantes Bhola e Didi.

programme.title: Um Lobo em Pele de Cordeiro, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Em uma terra mgica, em um prado calmo onde ovelhas podem viver sem preocupaes, problemas comeam a aparecer quando um grupo de lobos est instalado nas proximidades.

programme.title: Magia ao Luar, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Stanley um mgico ingls que tem dedicado sua vida a revelar espiritualistas fraudulentos. Ele pretende descobrir se a jovem Sophie mesmo mdium. Quanto mais tempo Stanley passa com ela, mais ele se encanta, correndo o risco de se apaixonar.

programme.title: Com seu orgulho por sua fora como duelista em jogo, Joey desafia Yugi pelo direito de enfrentar Pegasus.

programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Partida do Milnio, Parte 2

programme.title: Yugi descobriu como escapar da habilidade de Pegasus de ler mentes: Yugi alterna entre suas duas almas! Yugi consegue destruir o Mundo Toon de Pegasus, mas o duelo s comeou. O prximo nvel do mortal Jogo da Sombra est prestes a comear!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Partida do Milnio, Parte 3

programme.title: Yugi esmorece de cansao sob o poder do devastador Jogo da Sombra. Seus amigos gritam incentivos desesperados, mas suas vozes no conseguem penetrar a esfera de escurido. A chance de vitria de Yugi est esvaecendo, e sua vida tambm.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Partida do Milnio, Parte 4

programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Partida do Milnio, Parte 5

programme.title: A Saga Pegasus chega ao seu fim, mas uma nova jornada est prestes a comear! Yugi conhece um egpcio misterioso chamado Shadi, que entra na mente de Yugi com a Chave do Milnio.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR

programme.title: Yugi e seus amigos retornam do Reino dos Duelistas e conhecem uma jovem chamada Rebecca, que exige que o av de Yugi lhe devolva o Drago Branco de Olhos Azuis! Ela veio reivindicar a carta que o av de Yugi roubou do av dela muitos anos atrs!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR

programme.title: Rebecca est enganada em acreditar que o av de Yugi roubou o Drago Branco de Olhos Azuis do av dela. Yugi precisa defender o Drago Branco de Olhos Azuis para ensinar a ela que o que conta no o poder das cartas, mas o corao delas.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR

programme.title: A junta de diretores desonestos da KaibaCorp prende Kaiba dentro de um jogo de realidade virtual! Mokuba recruta Yugi e Joey para libertar Kaiba desse jogo sem igual, no qual perder equivale a morrer!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR

programme.title: A misso para resgatar Kaiba continua com uma ajudinha de... Mai? Mas ser que Yugi e seus amigos se adaptaro a um mundo virtual em que as regras e estratgias mudam a toda hora?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR

programme.title: Yugi e seus amigos resgatam Kaiba, mas ainda esto presos no jogo! A nica sada requer enfrentar o Drago de Cinco Cabeas, mas Joey, Mokuba e Mai perdem todos os seus pontos de vida no difcil duelo!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR

programme.title: Um novo aluno, Duke Devlin, derrota Joey em um jogo de Duel Monsters, forando Joey a ser seu servo. Duke fora Joey a usar um uniforme de cachorro e o humilha em pblico, forando Yugi a desafiar Duke para um duelo.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR

programme.title: Em troca da liberdade de Joey, Yugi concorda em desistir de Duel Monsters para sempre se ele perder. Sem conhecer bem as regras, Yugi comea mal. As chances dele no melhoram, e Duke revela que criou Monstros dos Dados-Masmorra com a ajuda de Pegasus!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR

programme.title: Yugi usa suas habilidades de jogo natas para virar a mesa contra Duke, mas Duke menciona mais uma regra: todas as criaturas ocupam territrio no tabuleiro-grade.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR

programme.title: Depois que o todo-poderoso Orgoth, o Implacvel de Duke deixa toda a esquadra de monstros de Yugi em pedaos, Yugi s tem mais um turno antes de perder todos os seus pontos de vida!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR

programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR

programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR

programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR

programme.title: Yugi descobre que era um fara poderoso que salvou o mundo 5.000 anos atrs e agora deve salv-lo de novo! No meio-tempo, Kaiba testa os poderes de Obelisco, o Atormentador, do Deck dos Deuses Egpcios, contra a fria do Drago Supremo de Olhos Azuis!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR

programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Caador Raro, Parte 2: Encarando Exodia

programme.title: O duelista psquico Espa Roba derrota Rex Raptor to fcil quanto a um otrio, e Joey o prximo da lista! Quais so as chances de Joey, quando Espa Roba tem a habilidade teleptica de ler todas as cartas na mo de Joey?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR

programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR

programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR

programme.title: Aps os dois jogos, o Inazuma Japan teve uma boa ideia de como o nvel mundial. Para avanar para o torneio mundial, eles precisaro desenvolver novas tcnicas.

programme.title: Tsubasa volta ao campo em gande estilo! Na partida contra o Munique, ele aplica uma jogada decisiva. Com Tsubasa de volta, o time joga de maneira totalmente diferente. Ento Hyuga e Tsubasa decidem deixar tudo ainda mais interessante.

programme.desc: Cary Grant is the suave American diplomat who pretends to be married in order to preserve his bachelor status. Ingrid Bergman is the glamorous leading lady of the London stage who has no scruples about having an affair with a married man.

programme.title: The Hound Of The Baskervilles, (1959, Crime)

programme.desc: This stellar retelling of Melville's classic is unsurpassed in entertainment, imagination and high adventure. Consumed by an insane rage, Captain Ahab (Gregory Peck) has but one purpose in life - revenge on the great white whale who disfigured him.

programme.title: The Woods, (2006, Crime)
programme.desc: A teenager is dropped off at a remote all-girls school deep in the forest. As her classmates start to disappear, the teenager begins to suspect that things are not what they appear to be at the school and that there is something in the forest.

programme.title: The Faculty, (1998, Horror)
programme.desc: A group of small-town high school students discovers their teachers are under the control of mind-controlling alien parasites. From a smart script by Kevin Williamson (SCREAM), and directed by action-expert Robert Rodriguez (FROM DUSK TO DAWN).

programme.title: The Prophecy, (1995, Thriller)
programme.desc: Oscar(r)-winner Christopher Walken stars in this supernatural thriller where the forces of Heaven and Hell fight an epic battle over mankind. Only a priest turned detective and a little girl can stop the dark angel Gabriel (Walken) and save the world.

programme.title: May, (2003, Horror)
programme.desc:
May grew up as a lonely oddball whose only friend was a perfectly kept doll. When she moves to L.A., she takes up with a handsome filmmaker and then an alluring lesbian, but every connection she makes turns out deadly.
Rated R

programme.title: Stigmata, (1999, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: A priest from the Vatican is sent to visit a woman who's showing signs of stigmata. The priest comes to find that the lady is truly possessed by something.

programme.title: Carrie, (2002, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Angela Bettis stars in this adaptation of Stephen King's classic tale of horror. Carrie White has been cursed with the power of telekinesis and when her tormenters commit an act of unforgivable humiliation, they'll soon learn a deadly lesson.

programme.title: Stephen King's Sometimes They Come Back, (1991, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: A high school teacher (Tim Matheson) faces the demon ghosts of a gang of former students. Brooke Adams, Robert Hy Gorman, Robert Rusler, Nicholas Sadler, and William Sanderson also star. Based on a short story by Stephen King.

programme.title: Hollow Man, (2000, Sci-Fi Horror)
programme.desc: Kevin Bacon and Elisabeth Shue play former lovers who, along with a team of other scientists like themselves, discover the secret of invisibility. Rating: R

programme.title: Undisputed, (2002, Action)
programme.desc: When the world's heavyweight champion is sent to prison, everything points to an inevitable showdown with the penitentiary's undefeated champ. But to make sure the meeting will happen, a former mob boss must call in favors from the outside world.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom, (1984, Action)

programme.title: 57 Seconds, (2024, Action)

programme.title: Hustle & Flow, (2005, Drama)
programme.desc: The tale of DJay, a pimp whose hustle selling sexy Nola leaves him wondering if this is it for him. Only when he trades contraband for a keyboard and bumps into his old schoolfriend Key does he see a way out by laying down some tracks.

programme.title: The Truman Show, (1998, Drama)
programme.desc: Truman doesnt realize that his quaint hometown is a giant studio set run by a visionary producer/director/creator (Ed Harris), that folks living and working there are Hollywood actors, that even his incessantly bubbly wife is a contract player.

programme.title: Hamburger Hill, (1987, War)
programme.desc: On the 11th May 1969, troops of the 101st airborne division engaged the enemy at the base of Hill 937 in the Ashau Valley. Ten days and eleven bloody assaults later, the troops who fought there called it Hamburger Hill.

programme.title: Hustle & Flow, (2005, Drama)
programme.desc: The tale of DJay, a pimp whose hustle selling sexy Nola leaves him wondering if this is it for him. Only when he trades contraband for a keyboard and bumps into his old schoolfriend Key does he see a way out by laying down some tracks.

programme.title: Kaboom, (2010, Comedy)
programme.desc: A hilarious erotic romp about a group of hot bisexual college kids hopping in and out of bed with each other while an evil cult plots to destroy the world.

programme.title: Surfer, Dude, (2008, Comedy)
programme.desc: Longboarding soul surfer Steve Addington (Matthew McConaughey) returns to Malibu for the summer to find his cool hometown vibe corrupted.

programme.desc: In this terrifying thriller, a mother must protect her son from an evil, supernatural entity that has escaped the pages of a children's book and is lurking in their home.

programme.desc: A young couple travels to a remote lake quarry in England, only to fend off a group of teenage hoods.

programme.title: Maniac (2012), (2013, Horror)

programme.title: Escape Room, (2017, Horror)

programme.desc: Michael Douglas plays Dan, a New York attorney who has a tryst with seductive Alex Forrest while his wife is away. Dan later shrugs off the affair as a mistake and considers it over. But Alex won't be ignored. Not now, not tomorrow, not ever.

programme.title: The Untouchables, (1987, Action)

programme.desc: Joey and Kaiba's battle reaches its roaring climax! Will Joey take down his biggest headache and actually teach Kaiba a thing or two about being a true duelist?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the critical Battle City showdown with the fate of the world at stake: Yami Yugi vs. Marik! If Yami Yugi loses, Yugi is taking a permanent vacation into the Shadow Realm!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik proves his The Winged Dragon of Ra is the strongest Egyptian God Card by destroying Slifer the Sky Dragon! None of Yugi's cards can withstand its assault, but a gift from Kaiba may turn the duel around

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi can't strike Marik's life points, and with every turn that passes, Marik is one step closer to taking down Yugi with a final strike from The Winged Dragon of Ra...

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With Yugi at the end of his ropes and the maniacal Marik waging all-out war, can Marik's oldest friend reach Marik in time to help him come to his senses before his insanity overwhelms him?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Will the combined force of all of Yugi's monsters be enough to defeat an Egyptian God that terminated two other powerful Egyptian Gods? The fate of the world hangs in the balance with the finale of the Battle City Tournament!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: KaibaCorp Island is set to explode in mere minutes, but the blimp's engines are offline! Can Yugi and friends escape from the island in time, or will they sink to the bottom of the sea?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Ta and Serenity tour around the Town of Domino and reminisce about their friends' battles during Battle City, they learn how much they've grown and far they've come... and how far they have left to go!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The three Egyptian God Cards are stolen! A terrifying new villain emerges! Real monsters begin to appear around the world! Can Yugi and the gang discover how these strange events are connected before the planet is destroyed?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With Seal of Orichalcos, not only can Gurimo have ten monsters at once, but each creature receives a power boost from Orichalcos's malevolent energies! Yugi better find a way to protect himself against Gurimo's horde!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Not only is our world on the brink of apocalypse, but an entire domain of monsters is also on the verge of collapse! Both Earth and the monster domain must unite and fight against the largest terror they have ever faced!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and the gang set off on a cross-country trek when they're asked for help from a one-eyed former foe.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba returns to Duelist Kingdom for a showdown against Pegasus! Will Kaiba discover the secret behind Pegasus's strategies before he loses his soul, just like he did on his first trip to Duelist Kingdom?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Not only does Alister's fiend gain attack points for every fiery monster on the field, but it can also take control of Kaiba's monsters! Will Alister get his revenge, or will Kaiba get aid from the monster domain?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mai's back to help Yugi take down Dartz and save the world from annihilation... or is a topsy-turvy twist in the works?

programme.desc: Mai has joined the enemy! Is she brainwashed, or is there some deeper reason for her unexpected transformation?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Taking advantage of the Seal of Orichalcos, Mai coordinates her Harpie Ladies to whittle Joey's forces into waste! Is this the last we'll see of him, or will a legendary guardian recognize Joey as a true duelist?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With the potent powers of Claw of Hermos, Joey transforms Time Wizard into an almighty... hammer? Can Joey master the uncanny abilities of his new card to pound Mai's Harpie Ladies before they slash him to shreds?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Professor Hawkins has discovered startling connections between the world's conundrums, the Orichalcos stones and an ancient lost civilization.

programme.desc: It's a Wild West showdown between Yugi and his fiercest challenge yet: Rafael and his guardian monsters.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Using the abilities of Seal of Orichalcos, Yugi grinds Rafael's guardians, but he's also succumbing to the card's evil influence. As darkness grows within his heart, the consequences of his non-heroic acts may be his undoing.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Dartz has captured Yugi's soul! Broken and unmotivated, how will our heroes ever rescue Yugi, especially when Dartz has a duo of nefarious new recruits ready to eradicate them?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: A cross-country expedition turns tragic when Dartz's new duelists separate Yugi from Joey in order to capture their souls separately.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Nothing will stop Weevil and Rex Raptor from quenching their thirst for revenge by capturing Yugi and Joey's souls!

programme.desc: Having lost the trust of Timaeus, Yugi can no longer use his guardian dragon against Weevil's insect invasion. Discouraged and confused, Yugi has lost his dueling instincts.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is on a vision quest where he must travel through a past of evil to find and conquer his greatest foe... himself.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is in no shape to duel... but Dartz doesn't care! Dartz sends out his ancient annihilator Orichalcos Soldier to finish Yugi once and for all.

programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Koza the leader of the rebel army finally discovers the evil mastermind behind Alabastas drought, but is he too late to prevent further bloodshed?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Battle is Over! Koza Raises the White Flag!

programme.title: When Koza is mysteriously shot, the rebellion is reborn, but Vivis cries for a cease-fire fall on deaf ears until a long-overdue hero swoops to the rescue!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Where Vivi's Voice Gets Heard! The Hero Descends!

programme.title: Luffy finally discovers the secret to knocking out a sandman, but it wont matter unless Vivi and the rest of the Straw Hats can locate the Baroque Works bomber.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sand Croc and Water Luffy!... The Second Round of the Duel!

programme.title: While his mates search for a bomb, Luffy narrowly survives his second scrape with Crocodile. Across town, Nico Robin strong-arms Cobra into revealing his countrys greatest secret.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: That Looks Croc-ish!... Luffy, Run to the Royal Tomb!

programme.title: With the walls crumbling down around them, Crocodile attacks Luffy with a poisoned pirate hook. Meanwhile, Vivi draws a bead on the bombers, but can she stop them in time?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Nightmare Draws Near!... This is the Sand-Sand Clan's Secret Base

programme.title: The Straw Hats team up to give Vivi one last shot at disarming the bomb that threatens to destroy her city. She succeeds in cutting the fuse, but Crocodile has a backup plan.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Magnificent Wings! My Name is Pell, Guardian Deity of the Country

programme.title: Pells sacrifice spares his beloved city, but only an act of god can stop the rebellion. With Crocodiles poison coursing through his body, Luffy musters a final attack against Alabastas oppressor.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I Will Surpass You! Rain Falls in Alabasta.

programme.title: Crocodile is defeated, the rain has returned to Alabasta, and Vivis people are eager to rebuild their kingdom. As for the Straw Hats, they have a fleet of marines breathing down their necks.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Farewell to Arms! Pirates and Different Ideas of Justice!

programme.title: Now that the rebellion is over, Vivi must make an important decision about her future. The Straw Hats are ready to hoist the anchor, but an ambiguous villain has stolen the Going Merry!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Pirates' Banquet And Operation Escape From Alabasta!

programme.title: Mr. 2 is a man of many faces, but he finally shows his true colors when the marines attack the Straw Hats. Elsewhere, Vivi has a scheme up her sleeve, and it involves Igaram wearing a dress.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: It All Started On That Day...! Vivi Tells The Story Of Her Adventure!

programme.title: Luffy and his crew watch Alabasta fade into the distance, but theres no time for reminiscing. The marines are in hot pursuit, and theres a stowaway aboard the Going Merry!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Scent of danger! The seventh member is Nico Robin!

programme.title: Fresh off their adventure Alabasta, the Straw Hats discover an isolated island where they can restock their food supply. Chopper is left to guard the ship, but he and Nico spend the afternoon exploring instead!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The First Patient! The Untold Story Of The Rumble Ball!

programme.title: When a mail-order salesman gets lost at sea, Nami finds the paper she needs to start making maps. If the Straw Hat crew can somehow manage to survive a deadly cyclone, she might actually get some use out of it!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Uprising of the Navigator! For the Unyielding Dream!

programme.title: Heavy fog leads to a close encounter of the culinary kind when Nico fishes a marine out of the drink. The aspiring chef is concerned about the quality of his curry, and Sanji is just the guy to refine his recipe!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Recipe Handed Down! Sanji, the Iron Man of Curry

programme.title: A break in the rain provides the perfect opportunity for Usopp to help a young girl fulfill her dream of launching the worlds largest firework.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I Will Make It Bloom! Usopp The Man And The Eight-Foot Shell!

programme.title: Money troubles force Zoro to tangle with Dick the Bandit and his treacherous gang of thugs. These gun-toting outlaws are terrorizing a peaceful village, and the Straw Hat swordsman aims to stop their reign of terror!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Fabled Pirate Hunter! Zoro, The Wandering Swordsman

programme.title: A barrage of Marine cannon balls forces the Straw Hats to seek refuge on an uncharted island. Once ashore, the crew encounters a strange old man living amongst a herd of goats.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Zenny Of The Island Of Goats And The Pirate Ship In The Mountains!

programme.title: Old man Zenny made a fortune lending money to scallywags, but he always dreamed of becoming a pirate himself. When the marines set out to trap the Straw Hats, the wily hermit may finally get his wish!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: How's Tricks? The Designs of Zenny the Moneylender!

programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Whereabouts of the Island Treasure! Attack of the Zenny Pirates!

programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin is shot, and Albert gets his hands on the notebook. Lupin is saved by Jigen and Goemon and manages to survive his injuries under care. He then explains his past with Albert and how they know each other.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: After learning the shocking truth about Jose's terrifying plot, Lupin heads to Jose's headquarters with Albert, his old thieving comrade. Jigen and Goemon fight off the heaviest opposition while Lupin and Albert head into the heart of the enemy territory.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: To steal the fortune of the Drug King Pablo, the gang heads to South America with Fujiko. As Fujiko distracts the target, Lupin picks off the remains of Pablo's guards while making his way through the jungle.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: In a rural town in France, full of cosplayers. Within the town celebrating a pop-cultural event is Goemon. Next to the inn, he decides to keep watch at is Chlo's Bistro. Chlo is exactly the woman Goemon was looking for Lupin's current target.
programme.sub-title: The Extravagance of Goemon Ishikawa XIII

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Having enrolled at the Annecy School for Girls, Ami encounters a strange girl in the garden who aims her bow at a crow. The girl is Dolma, the princess of the Kingdom of Padar. Having no friends, Ami finds herself opening up to the odd Dolma.
programme.sub-title: The Bow, The Princess, and the Terrorist

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: "Princess Dolma, please save Padar." With that request, Dolma is taken home. Lupin follows shortly, and Ami decides to accompany Fujiko to Padar in order to save Dolma.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin is pierced by Dolma's arrow. Ami and Fujiko take Lupin and escape, hiding in a deserted building. The three of them decide to flee, with Lupin badly injured.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Padar sinks into chaos because of the civil war, but things take a sudden turn when the Shake Hands company gets involved. A proclamation by the king is posted online, proving him to be alive.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: "I want you to find out who killed my husband." Three years ago, someone shot Count Maupassant to death.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Shortly after moving into the hideout in Riquewihr, Lupin wakes up to a broken bathroom. After bickering with Jigen for access to the bathroom, Fujiko appears.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: A string of indiscriminate shootings has struck Northern Africa. They're actually a challenge to Lupin from the wealthy Zylberstein.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin's gang visits the Northern Angel, on the outskirts of Russia. What at first seems like a snowy, dull town turns out to be full of riches to the joy of the group of thieves.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: "Peoplelog"--a social media service that uses AI to analyze the incredible amount of data on the internet, allowing you to learn all about a person.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Fujiko has been captured. She's being held at Orig Island, the headquarters of Shake Hands. Lupin and the gang, including Ami, head there to find her.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: "Papa! Save Lupin!" Ami is reunited with her long-last father. But Enzo is already obsessed with using Peoplelog to save the world.
programme.sub-title: Just Then, An Old Buddy Said Something

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin III has vanished from the internet. Meanwhile, the man himself is updating Peoplelog with confidential information that begins to throw the world into chaos.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin receives an invitation to join a race by Mr. X. Jigen and Goemon questions Lupin's willingness to join despite knowing it's a trap, but Lupin has his eyes on the Golden Statue rumored to be in a mansion near the race course.
programme.sub-title: 50th Anniversary Special - Is Lupin Still Burning?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd TVSP #17: Tactics Of Angels
programme.desc: Lupin faces his toughest opponents yet! Four women known as the Bloody Angels are after the strange metallic sphere he stole from Area 51. To get their hands on potential alien technology, they're willing to do anything.

programme.desc: Lupin's attempt to steal a time machine causes a crazy mishap! Now stuck in ancient Japan, his team and Inspector Zenigata must join forces to get back to their own time. But notorious thief Lupin has enemies everywhere... and everywhen!

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #20: Sweet Lost Night
programme.desc: Turns out the Magic Lamp is real, and Lupin's found a way to steal it! But this genie has a price: to grant his wish, she demands half his memories.

programme.desc: Um homem procura o mundo para um conjunto de artefatos msticos - 12 cabeas de bronze dos animais do zodaco chins.

programme.title: Morte Por Encomenda
programme.desc: Detetive contratado para encontrar uma stripper, mas tudo se complica quando quem ele questiona acaba morto.

programme.title: O Imperador
programme.desc: Aps se tornar alvo de seu irmo mais velho, o herdeiro de um trono decide procurar a ajuda de sua irm e de um cavaleiro desacreditado, Jacob (Nicolas Cage), que precisa enfrentar vrios problemas pessoais. Juntos, eles buscam o apoio de Gallain (Hayden Christensen), um lendrio cavaleiro conhecido como Fantasma Branco.

programme.title: Sobibor
programme.desc: O oficial sovitico, Alexander Pechersky, organiza uma revolta e fuga em massa de prisioneiros do campo de extermnio de Sobibr, em outubro de 1943.

programme.title: A Espada De Deus - A ltima Cruzada
programme.desc: Dois cavaleiros cristos chegam a uma ilha remota com a inteno de converter os aldees pagos sua religio. O primeiro busca conquist-los com compreenso e humildade, enquanto o segundo confia na intimidao e na violncia. medida que a ruptura se forma, os aldees devem decidir de que lado esto, e os homens, at onde esto dispostos a ir e quanto sangue ser derramado.

programme.title: Cestronautas - Aventura no Paraso
programme.desc: Quando um redemoinho misterioso e perigoso aparece nos trpicos do Oceano Atlntico, Belka e Strelka, os primeiros astronautas a retornar de sua misso em Saturno, so enviados para investigar.

programme.title: Palau: Um Homem de F
programme.desc: "Palau: Um Homem de F" um longa-metragem que celebra o legado de Luis Palau, um dos lderes religiosos mais influentes da ltima dcada.

programme.title: Max Steel
programme.desc: Aos 16 anos de idade, Max McGrath descobre que seu corpo pode gerar a energia mais poderosa do universo, ele deve vincular-se com o nico ser capaz de conten-lo: um extraterrestre tecno-orgnico misterioso chamado Steel. Unidos como o super-heri Max Steel, os dois amigos devem combater uma ameaa aliengena e desvendar os segredos de seu passado.

programme.title: O Resgate da Princesa
programme.desc: Uma histria da era dos valentes cavaleiros, belas princesas e feiticeiros malignos. Ruslan, um artista que sonha em se tornar um cavaleiro, conhece e se apaixona pela bela Mila, sem perceber que ela filha do Rei.

programme.title: Desenhos Animados do Velho Testamento - Elias
programme.desc: A multido silencia com as palavras do profeta Elias. Relmpagos e troves ecoam no Monte Carmelo.

programme.title: Desenhos Animados do Velho Testamento - Daniel
programme.desc: O rei da Babilnia convoca Daniel para interpretar um sonho. Ao contrrio dos magos reais, ele no inventa nada, simplesmente repete o que ouviu do Senhor.

programme.title: Donkey Xote
programme.desc: Uma histria de Don Quixote contada por um burro de Sancho Pana...

programme.title: Uma Estrela No Paraso
programme.desc: Nascida no Natal, Noelle acredita que tem o dom de fazer milagres, ento quando o conivente desenvolvedor McKerrod ameaa sua vida pacfica, ela e seus amigos decidem usar esse dom para frustrar seus planos e salvar sua aldeia.

programme.desc: Jack Tyson est prestes a ganhar um prmio em dinheiro em uma corrida ilegal de carros do Mxico Califrnia quando uma mulher desesperada, fugindo do namorado gangster que est organizando o torneio, pula em seu carro implorando por ajuda.

programme.desc: Nesta abordagem nica sobre os infames assassinatos de Manson, seguimos duas geraes de eventos reais assustadores que ocorrem no 10050 Cielo Drive, um dos endereos mais notrios dos Estados Unidos.

programme.desc: Turk Henry (Antonio Banderas) um astro de rock com uma agenda atribulada de shows e entrevistas. programme.desc: Um homem de meia-idade que est cansado de seu trabalho e tem de suportar a infidelidade de sua esposa aceita, com relutncia, a tarefa de ser mentor de um adolescente rebelde.

Sem saber direito o que fazer na vida, ele encontra Evelyn (Alma Jodorowsky), uma mulher que o apresenta ao lado bomio da cidade. Logo, ele conhece um grupo de jovens ricos que s querem saber de drogas e festas.

programme.desc: Uma terapeuta de casais, feliz no casamento, descobre que os pais esto se divorciando e tudo sai do controle.

programme.desc: Kathy uma escritora de sucesso. Quando ela volta, se lembra de sua vida antes de deixar a comunidade Amish.

programme.desc: Jogador de beisebol Miquias Matias e seu filho Bobby se acabar na pitoresca comunidade Amish de Sugarcreek, Ohio em um conjunto de aliases. Trs Amish irms execuo de uma antiga quinta inn lev-los debaixo das suas asas, e empregar Mica como um faz-tudo.

programme.title: Preciso ser pai
programme.desc: Se os vinte anos so a poca da diverso, ento Jonah entende bem do assunto, at que ele recebe um diagnstico de que ficar infrtil em um ms. De repente, o garoto festeiro muda completamente suas prioridades. Ele tenta congelar o esperma, mas quando isso d errado, s restam trs semanas de fertilidade para Jonah.

programme.desc: Uma estrela de reality show deixa Hollywood e se reencontra em uma comunidade Amish, em Nebraska, onde deve decidir entre permanecer em sua nova realidade ou retornar antiga.

programme.title: Xeque-Mate
programme.desc: Um caso de identidade equivocada coloca Slevin no meio de uma guerra sendo tramada por dois dos chefes do crime mais rivais da cidade. Sob vigilncia constante do detetive Brikowski e do assassino Goodkat, ele deve peg-los antes que eles o peguem.

programme.title: Um Plano Brilhante
programme.desc: Na Londres de 1960, um faxineiro convence uma executiva frustrada a planejar o roubo de diamantes na empresa onde trabalham. Chocada com a proposta do educado senhor, ela aceita, mas no demora muito para um investigador desconfie dela.

programme.title: A Perseguio
programme.desc: Ottway trabalha em um lugar isolado no Alasca. Certo dia, quando retornava cidade para matar a saudade da esposa, o avio cai. Feridos e sem alimentos, os sobreviventes lutam pela vida e tentam reencontrar a civilizao.

programme.title: A Vinganca Minha
programme.desc: Aps o ataque a seu complexo, Kane enterra seus amigos e parte para vingar suas mortes. Monte uma nova equipe e siga o caminho atravs da fronteira para Vancouver.

programme.title: Penalidade Mxima
programme.desc: Danny Meehan (Vinnie Jones) um verdadeiro dolo do futebol ingls.Entretanto, Danny perde tudo o que conquistou em sua carreira ps ter sido acusado de manipular o resultado de um jogo.

programme.title: Co de briga
programme.desc: Criado por um mafioso (Hoskins) como um animal para ser uma mquina de matar, (Jet Li) campeo de lutas clandestinas que ajuda pianista cego (Freeman) perseguido por criminosos.

programme.title: Renegados
programme.desc: Quatro veteranos de combate so obrigados a voltar ao quando um deles brutalmente assassinado por uma gangue internacional. Unidos pela dor e pela fria, eles embarcam em uma misso de vingana pelas ruas cruis de Londres.

programme.title: Vingana
programme.desc: Um ex-agente antinarcticos vai atrs do responsvel pelo assassinato de sua esposa, a lder de uma organizao criminosa.

programme.title: Como assaltar um banco
programme.desc: Ruggero um homem tranquilo, mas impulsivamente decide roubar um banco para provar que corajoso o suficiente para sua ex-mulher, que o abandonou.

programme.title: A Arma
programme.desc: Dallas uma mquina de matar. Seus ataques a gangues de motociclistas e laboratrios de metanfetamina irritam o chefe da mfia de Las Vegas, que sequestra sua namorada. Dallas no ir parar at que a justia seja feita.

programme.title: Desaparecidos
programme.desc: Alice Launey, uma especialista forense francesa ainda assombrada por seu passado, vem a Seul para apresentar seu trabalho. Ela conhecer JinHo, um detetive que pede sua ajuda em um caso de assassinato.

programme.title: O Estrangeiro
programme.desc: Um empreiteiro militar britnico Lex Walker informado que sua filha morreu. Ao chegar em Los Angeles, ele descobre que o corpo no de sua filha, e uma investigao comea.

programme.title: Jogo de Morte
programme.desc: Quando a CIA no consegue resolver um problema, o agente Marcus entra no jogo. Ele ter que escolher entre a lealdade com sua equipe ou fazer o que certo durante uma misso aps um segurana de um diplomata e sua equipe sofrerem um atentado.

programme.title: Caador de Demnios
programme.desc: Um grupo de Rogue Angels designados para entregar almas condenadas ao inferno escurece, tornando-se algozes da humanidade antes que tenham a oportunidade de se arrepender.

programme.title: A Maldio - A Famlia Nunca Esquece
programme.desc: Inspirado no folclore do Leste Europeu, uma traio impensvel leva a uma maldio malfica colocada sobre a linhagem de uma famlia. Dcadas depois, um casamento une a prxima gerao de famlias distantes.

programme.title: Hotel da Morte
programme.desc: Dois funcionrios de um hotel, que est s vsperas de fechar, se deparam com fenmenos paranormais assustadores. Tudo leva a crer que uma histria de amor que acabou em morte, em um dos quartos do lugar, seja a causa de tudo isso.

programme.title: O Semideus
programme.desc: Um casal viaja para uma cabana isolada e descobrem a histria aterrorizante do local. No demora at que tenham que enfrentar momentos de puro horror na imensa floresta que os cerca.

programme.title: O Mal Est Ao Seu Lado
programme.desc: Um grupo de amigos decide fazer um jogo de espritos. Em um crculo formado por cem velas, eles devem escolher uma delas e contar uma histria de terror. Conforme as chamas so apagadas, eventos estranhos comeam a acontecer.

programme.title: A Maldio do Manequim
programme.desc: No se move, no pensa, apenas mata. Para uma jovem, um encontro casual com essa entidade sobrenatural devastador. Frankie descobre que, uma vez que ela veja o manequim, pode no haver fim vista, exceto o dela.

programme.title: Urge: Droga Mortal
programme.desc: Uma viagem a uma ilha torna-se mortal quando o dono de uma casa noturna misteriosa apresenta a um grupo de amigos uma droga que no pode ser tomada mais de uma vez.

programme.title: Rostos na Multido
programme.desc: Um serial killer teme a cidade. Um espectador inocente testemunha seu ltimo ataque, mas quando ela foge, ela cai de uma ponte e fica inconsciente.

programme.title: A Presa
programme.desc: Um grupo de mulheres embarca para uma caminhada numa trilha e so atacadas por um grupo de caadores, que as perseguem e torturam mata adentro. Em uma batalha extrema pela sobrevivncia, as pessoas so capazes do impensvel quando esto no limite.

programme.title: Agente Vermelho
programme.desc: A Guerra Fria acabou e os russos devolvem uma arma biolgica roubada dos EUA. O oficial Hendricks foi designado para pegar o vrus e escolt-lo num submarino. No caminho, porm, terroristas tentam tomar conta do transporte e roubar a arma.

programme.title: Desejo de Vingana
programme.desc: Quando uma jornalista informada por um agente do FBI que seu marido acaba de ser assassinado, os dois unem foras para desvendar uma rede de enganos chocante e mortal.

programme.title: Caada Implacvel
programme.desc: Quando um grupo de guerreiros fugitivos pega Rhodes e sua filha como refm, um desejo imenso de vingana vai dominar seu territrio. E ele no vai ter d de quem ousar cruzar seu caminho.

programme.title: A Tumba do Diabo
programme.desc: Sob o comando do veterano de guerra Mack , um grupo de mercenrios contratado pela CIA com a misso de resgatar um cientista, que trabalha em uma descoberta arqueolgica, no deserto do Oriente Mdio.

programme.title: Donnie Darko
programme.desc: Um adolescente problemtico tem vises de um homem em uma grande roupa de coelho manipulando-o para cometer uma srie de crimes, aps ele escapar por pouco de um acidente estranho.

programme.title: Garota em Chamas: Rebelio
programme.desc: Uma garota do ensino mdio descobre que seus talentos telecinticos so mais perigosos do que imaginava quando perseguida por criminosos. Agora ela ter que descobrir seu passado para controlar seus poderes e sobreviver.

programme.title: Skyline - A Invaso
programme.desc: Luzes estranhas descem sobre a cidade de Los Angeles, atraindo as pessoas para fora como mariposas para uma chama onde uma fora extraterrestre ameaa engolir toda a populao humana da face da Terra.

programme.title: Em Busca da Fama

programme.title: Police Story 2 - Codinome: Radical
programme.desc: Os mtodos incomuns de um policial de Hong Kong levam ao seu rebaixamento para o trnsito, apesar do sucesso. Enquanto isso, um antigo inimigo sai da priso em busca de vingana.

programme.title: Mscara Negra

programme.title: A Hora do Acerto

programme.title: O Monge Prova de Balas

programme.title: Sem Segurana Nenhuma

programme.title: Misso Quase Impossvel
